articles.title: NFL will play international games in 2 new countries as 2025 schedule comes into view
articles.description: The NFL continues to grow its global fanbase, adding Ireland and Spain as host countries for its 2025 regular season schedule, which will be available on Wednesday.

articles.title: The NFL Expands Its International Presence With 7 Games Overseas
articles.description: Berlin, Madrid and Dublin will be first-time hosts, and the NFL will play three games in old standby London and one in Sao Paulo, Brazil, first visited last season.

articles.title: Did Green Bay Packers reject ad for Musk's Tesla electric vehicles at Lambeau Field?
articles.description: Online users shared a story claiming the famed NFL franchise had very specific reasons in mind for rejecting the Tesla CEO's advertisement.

articles.title: Who is Taylor Elgersma? Get to know the Green Bay Packers' newest quarterback
articles.description: Taylor Elgersma signed with the Packers on May 12 after a tryout. He played college football in Canada.

articles.title: YouTube to stream Week 1 Brazil game for free
articles.description: YouTube will stream the NFL's Week 1 game in Brazil to a worldwide audience for free, the NFL announced.

articles.title: New poll finds about 3 in 10 adults follow women's sports
articles.description: Those who follow women’s pro sports are more casual, tending to say they attend or watch games occasionally rather than frequently.

articles.title: About 3 in 10 US adults follow women’s sports, a new AP-NORC poll finds
articles.description: As women’s sports increase in popularity and accessibility, a relatively large share are casual fans.

articles.title: Packers guard missed out on an extra $2 million in salary by two snaps
articles.description: Sean Rhyan narrowly missed qualifying for the Proven Performance Escalator

articles.title: YouTube Will Be Home to an Exclusive NFL Game in 2025
articles.description: The game will be streamed live to YouTube’s global audience for free.

articles.title: Three former Texas Longhorns set to attend NFLPA Rookie Premiere event in LA
articles.description: Three former Texas Longhorns will represent the university at the 31st annual NFLPA Rookie Premiere, taking place May 14-17 in Los Angeles.
